job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pJob Title Software Engineer 5ppLocation Mountain View CA 100 Remote is an option for this role as long as the candidate can work PST time zoneppRole Full TimeppbrppJob ResponsibilitiesppRequirementspp 6 years of professional experience as a Sr Software Engineerpp 4 years of solid experience in Ruby on Rails with experience in libraries like Resque and RSpecpp Experience with GrapQL is a big pluspp Experience in ReactJSRedux JavaScript frameworks Ad experience a pluspp Experience in JavaScript HTML5 CSS3 and other core web technologiespp Experience in consuming REST APIs in JavaScriptNodeJSpp Experience in SCM Source Code Management systems and tools such as GITpp Strong knowledge in Computer Science foundationspp BSMS in Computer ScienceEngineering or equivalent experiencep
